description: Load and process documents from Confluence wiki collaboration platform

url.info: The base URL of the Confluence Space. Example: https://<company>.atlassian.net/wiki

space_key.info: The key identifier of the Confluence space to load documents from

cloud.info: Whether to use Confluence Cloud (true) or Server/Data Center (false)

content_format.info: Specify content format for loaded documents (STORAGE, VIEW, EDITOR, EXPORT_VIEW, or ANONYMOUS_EXPORT_VIEW)

max_pages.info: Maximum number of pages to retrieve in total (default: 1000)

errors.load_failed: Failed to load documents from Confluence space '{space_key}': {error}

logs.loader_built: Confluence loader built - Space: {space_key}, Max Pages: {max_pages}
logs.loading_documents: Starting to load documents from Confluence space: {space_key}
